room_title: Escape room "Captured: The Basement" by Escape Rooms Portland Michigan in Lansing
room_description: In 1987, the Pennhurst Insane Asylum was forced to close its doors due to the many abuse and neglect accusations. Despite the closing, one doctor still continues with his old ways. Unfortunately, you’re one of his victims and have been placed in his basement prison holding cell. He’s just left to find more victims and you estimate he’ll be back in one hour. Now’s your chance to escape! Can you get out in time?
